A

addAnimation(String) - Method in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Adds the provided atlas animation region based on its name to AnimatedSprite.ANIMATIONS.
addAnimation(String, AtlasAnimation) - Method in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Adds the provided AtlasAnimation into AnimatedSprite.ANIMATIONS.
addAnimation(String, float, Animation.PlayMode) - Method in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Adds the provided atlas animation region based on its name to AnimatedSprite.ANIMATIONS.
AnimatedSprite - Class in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d
An extension of the LibGDX Sprite class with a built-in animation system.
AnimatedSprite(TextureAtlas, String, float, Animation.PlayMode) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Creates an AnimatedSprite object by only providing the properties of the animation.
AnimatedSprite(TextureAtlas, String, float, Animation.PlayMode, float, float) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Creates an AnimatedSprite object by providing the properties of the animation and the position of the sprite.
ANIMATION - Variable in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AtlasAnimation
Default LibGDX Animation object.
ANIMATIONS - Variable in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Stores a set of previously used AtlasAnimation, each referenced by calling their 'name' as a String.
animationTime - Variable in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Controls the internal animation time used to check the duration of the animation playing and calculate the current frame to display.
animationTime - Variable in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AtlasAnimation
Internal clock for an animation.
ATLAS - Variable in class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
Stores the selected atlas file for use.
AtlasAnimation - Class in com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d
Creates and stores an Animation based on a TextureAtlas.
AtlasAnimation(TextureAtlas, String, float, Animation.PlayMode) - Constructor for class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AtlasAnimation
Creates an AtlasAnimation object by providing each aspect of an animation.
